gen:link.msg:message: `ProvisionsOther` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ProvisionsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ProvisionsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsOtherCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsOtherCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsOtherDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsOtherDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
